title: Three things you need to know to be an effective leader in the world of open data

details.description:
Open data is changing the way that businesses are working, which creates exciting opportunities as well as challenges for leaders. This session will help you understand three key concepts that will help you lead your organisation into the open era.

<< Back to full schedule

Suitable for

Anyone who is driving change, managing a team or has aspirations to be a leader.

About the trainer: Simon Bullmore

Simon helps the Open Data Institute’s community and customers to develop the skills they need to work with open data. His approach to building the ODI’s training business and advising customers is based on 16 years of experience working in learning and organisational change.

Before joining the ODI, Simon launched the first European office for Harvard Business School. He has also helped grow a startup learning company that focused on open source software development, and was a consultant for the HR advisory division of Manpower Group. His natural enthusiasm for understanding how people and organisations change was given a firmer foundation during his masters degree in organisational psychology from Birkbeck College, the University of London.
